title: Mexican Potato Pancakes
ingredients: ['5 potatoes, peeled and grated', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 dash hot sauce, or to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 eggs', '1-2 green chillies, seeded and minced', '3 tablespoons rice flour', '4 tablespoons cooking oil', 'To serve', '150g grated Cheddar cheese', '100ml soured cream', 'shop-bought salsa', 'jarred jalapeno slices']
